body: @ninjinchan No they're not. I thought the same too as first when it wasn't translated and I had to commission this dj to clear the smoke. It's just that in page two Percy used the skill called "Replicate" to create a puppet with the same appearance, abilities and HP as the user thus why on page 5 we see the other Percy's shorts tear apart and his expression change on the next page with a disturbed expression.
are these pages out of order or something?
